name: Brick the Castle
description:
Brick the Castle is a brick breaker clone with few original features.

These features include horizontal layout, shooting ball from a catapult, and few more.

This game has been done for gamedevleague.com Brick Jam.

The goal of this jam was to create brick breaker clone within 72 hours.


The Controls:

Arrow keys for aiming catapult and the ram(bat).

Space or Left Control for shooting the ball.


There are some bugs with this game, unfortunately a wasn't able to fix them in time. Most of them are related to UI switching states, if that happens just reload the game.


Source is available here:

https://github.com/NanoMesh/GDLBrickBreakerJam
